assessment_steps.extracted_paper_info: The EGFR pathway is known to be involved in the development and progression of NSCLC, particularly in cases with activating mutations such as L858R.

assessment_steps.step_name: Step 2: Evaluate applicability of general classes of assay used in the field
assessment_steps.extracted_paper_info: We used an enzyme-linked immunosorbent assay (ELISA) to measure EGFR kinase activity in cell lysates.

overall_conclusion: The functional assay used in this paper demonstrates a very strong association between EGFR L858R mutation and increased kinase activity, supporting its classification as pathogenic.
